bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Electrical Penetration Assemblies in Containment Structures for Nuclear Fueled Power Generating Stations
IEEE Standard for Electrical Penetration Assemblies in Containment Structures for Nuclear Fueled Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document prescribes the mechanical, electrical, and test requirements for the design, construction, and. installation of electrical penetration assemblies in containment structures for stationary nuclear fueled power generating stations. The electrical conductor and insulation characteristics of external circuits which connect to penetration assemblies are beyond the scope of these criteria. If there should be any conflict between this document and those documents referenced herein, this document shall take precedence over the referenced documents.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
